title: Ghost Nicotine Pouches By 77
description: TRY 77 GHOST NICOTINE POUCHES Ghost nicotine pouches by 77 is an extra strong nicotine pouch with a new, strongly cooling mint flavour. With this tray, you can be seen everywhere! View all 77 Pouches View all Mint/Menthol Pouches View all Extra Strong Pouches KEY FEATURES: 50MG Per Gram | 32.5MG Per Pouch Ghost flavoured nicotine pouches Recommended for experienced users Tobacco-free, smoke-free and vapour-free 20 pouches in each can MORE ABOUT MINT FLAVOURED NICOTINE POUCHES The alluring and cooling flavour of the fresh mint provides an unbeatable, refreshing nicotine experience and invigorating taste, helping you leave cigarettes behind for good. MORE ABOUT 77 NICOTINE POUCHES 77 were the first polish brand of tobacco-free nicotine pouches. 77 offers one of the most diverse ranges of flavour on the market, 77 also hit the sweet spot with their nicotine levels. Switch up, switch down, mix and match â€“ do whatever suits you best! Flavours range from different types of mint to peach, apple, strawberries, and even classic tobacco.
